product_name: Horny Toad Mojac Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Deftly engineered to act like a jacket but feel like a shirt, the Horny Toad Mojac is made of richly colored flannel and fully lined with a buttery T-shirt knit, both made of 100% organic cotton. Made from organic cotton for breathable comfort and easy care. Jac-shirt styling includes snaps at the chest pockets, cuffs and a front-closure system; also features a contrast chambray lining and a relaxed, shirttail hem. Full-front snap placket allows easy on and off. Snap-flap chest pockets have extra drop-in pockets for lots of storage. 2-piece collar with button tab. Horny Toad Mojac Shirt is fully lined with Butterknit fabric for excellent comfort. Closeout.
short_description: Deftly engineered to act like a jacket but feel like a shirt, the Horny Toad Mojac is made of richly colored flannel and fully lined with a buttery T-shirt knit, both made of 100% organic cotton.
